185990478.review: LOVED THE GAME, WISH MORE OF THESE ADVENTURE PUZZLE GAMES WERE AVAILABLE

185890854.review: Przeszedlem caly rozdział w 11h. Wspaniala kreskowka grafika niczym Broken sword i inne podobne tytuly, ktore powoduja radosc w moich oczach i usmiech na twarzy, Bardzo ciekawe zagadki i niesamowicie wciągająca fabuła.  Brakuje polskich napisow bardzo prosze o dodanie, gdyz aby w nia spokojnie pograć i zrozumiec, potrzeba znajomości angielskiego na poziomie expert.

185820604.review: Dieses Spiel ist charmant, vielseitig und hat einen sehr guten Humor. Die Charaktere ziehen dich den Bann. Manchmal will man mit ihnen weinen und genauso auch mit ihnen lachen. Es nimmt mich mit in eine Welt voller Abenteuer. Ich liebe das Spiel so sehr da musste ich gleich alle Kapitel kaufen. Holt euch das Spiel es lohnt sich auf jeden Fall^^

185227977.review: BEST GAME EVer, I love it down to the soundtrack, the story and the witty jokes. Also the puzzles are very unique and make you think. Its also really fun to play this game down to completion and try to get all the funny acheivements. Overall I recommend 10/10 game

185059732.review: The game is divided into five chapters. The free game only includes the first chapter. You need to buy a season pass to play the remaining four chapters. Personally, I think this is a good idea, but you're not really missing anything skipping the premium chapters. The first chapter is the absolute peak of the game in terms of humor, charm, and puzzling. From then on it gets more awkward the further you go. I think it is perfectly fine to play the first chapter and call it a day. I'm not saying the later chapters are bad or ruin the game in any way, but if you're not sure whether the season pass is worth it, your money might be better spent elsewhere.

184741807.review: Really brilliant game. Fun and logical. I would say the puzzles are more intuitive and easier than other similar games which is a good thing actually.

184593769.review: Nice starter, cheap DLC (Discounts), and overall straightforward.

184272189.review: Charming art and spectacular voice acting make this cheesy, lighthearted adventure both approachable and engaging. The puzzles are simple, the world is fun to roam around - nothing complicated, nothing gut wrenching, nothing impossible. Feels like it'd be a great intro to gaming for a kid or a novice, currently serving me nicely as a palate cleanser post-Elden Ring: this game feels like a comfort food I'll come back and back to in years to come.

184165024.review: I grew up playing all of the original King's Quest games from the 90's. This remake was soooooo fun and perfect! The nostalgia and game play was spot on!

184145356.review: No spoilers. I must say that I am impressed and was thoroughly entertained! I added chapter one many years ago, but just now got around to playing it. Fantastically fun! The voice talents are top notch! The animation is clear, quirky, and well done! Wonderfully humorous! I knew after just a few minutes of playing that I would enjoy it immensely, so I purchased the season pass for the rest of the chapters, currently on Steam sale, so act quick and get a great price on all of the chapters of this great game! The only warning I would give people is to remember to change your save slots if you want to experience different choices without replaying the entire game; the game has an autosave feature, and I got to 100% completion before I realised I could change save slots. There are only 4 save slots though, and I don't think that you need to save multiple copies all the way through the game, but remember to save before the final battle, where different choices would yield different endings (which I didn't do). Oh well, I will enjoy playing through right from the start again! Maybe after I do all the other chapters; after all, I only did just complete chapter one (which is FREE)! Even if you do not purchase the rest of the chapters (which you should IMHO), you owe it to yourself to at least play chapter one. 9.5 out of 10

183671751.review: This game is a awesome point and click puzzle solving game similar to Curse of Monkey Island.  I love the story line through the chapters and love the choices you get to make.  I am sad that the game though long feels short because of how much fun it is.
